column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes the poem The Happy Mariners.
* 1916 - J.R.R. Tolkiens second five-day front-line duty begins.
* 1982 - The second episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column2: "The Ring-forges of Eregion" is released in Europe.
